attributes.action: Remove hotel quarantine for fully vaccinated UK residents flying from Red list
attributes.additional_details:
The Government have announced that, UK residents who are fully vaccinated through the UK vaccine roll-out will no longer have to self-isolate when travelling from Amber list. This update means that vaccination makes positive changes which should be reflected to travellers from Red list countries as well
There are many fully vaccinated UK residents who have not seen their loved ones living overseas since cannot take risk of staying in a hotel quarantine with their large families and small kids.
attributes.background:
Fully vaccinated UK residents under the UK Covid Vaccination scheme should be able to self-isolate at their own UK home rather than a hotel when travelling from a Red List country.
This minimum update is needed to set a fair and equal approach in parallel with updates for travellers from Amber list

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588072
